cab.content: l''rom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,3rd July 1919.(Received 4th,'G.30 p.m.)8995. 3rd July. Malleson wires 2nd July repeated to Tehran : "1. Trans-Caspia. Trans-Caspian position east ol' Kaahka was attacked by Bolshevics on 30th June. Direct hits were obtained on Bolshevics' armoured train which was set on (ire. Enemy then retired."2. Bolshevics' aeroplanes flew over Kaahka on 1st July and dropped propaganda,"
